topics.body:
You know, I may have my disagreements with Mr. Bennett the Sage (especially in regards to Eva) but at least he's decent enough to say that his opinions are just that. Opinions. The thoughts of a singular individual. Which makes him LEAGUES above such other critics like Yahtzee.
Seriously though fuck Yahtzee.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d742046368727af9b10100#post_53d742046368727af9b10100
In my personal opinion, if you want a snarky, British game reviewer, I'd pick John "Totalbiscut" Bain above Yahtzee any day of the week.
topics.author: 513e68eda4c72d4e3b000164

topics.body:
"@Ore-O":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d745ac6368723f05bf0000#post_53d745ac6368723f05bf0000
I haven't watched any if TotalBiscuit's reviews. How does he normally go about doing it?
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d74682636872219d4d0000#post_53d74682636872219d4d0000
Well, he starts out with "Ladies and Gentlemen, my name is Totalbiscut and I am here to ask one simple question, 'WTF is (insert title here)?'" He also made a Hearthstone show called "Lord of the Arena" and made a few LPs with Yogscast and Jesse Cox. Though personally, I haven't seen one of his reviews in a while.
topics.author: 513e68eda4c72d4e3b000164

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d742046368727af9b10100#post_53d742046368727af9b10100
I Think That Bennet the sage is an Irredeemable asshat and Yahtzee is the better Caustic critic.

My logic is that Yahtzee isn't trying to be a High class video game reviewer, And While Bennet could fall under the same banner, There's a lot more that's blatantly wrong that I can use against him, And He just isn't funny, Which is what allows me to forgive Yahtzee's more egregious moments.
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184
